alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 1:20PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Polk and northeastern Hillsborough Counties through 200 PM EST... At 119 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Plant City, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Auburndale, Lakeland Linder Airport, Fussels Corner, Medulla, Combee Settlement, Lake Alfred, Polk City, Rockridge, Gibsonia, Plant City Airport, Winston, Crystal Lake, Kathleen, Willow Oak and Lakeland Highlands. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for central and west central Florida.
